result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jacques G Simon II

records.addlTxt: 11:39 AM. JL-Clerk.  Attorney Derek W Sanders in court for Jacques G Simon II.  Attorney David Stilin in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jacques G Simon II in court. Def waives PH. CT accepts waiver. CT finds PC, def bound over for trial. ARGN: Reading waived. Plea NG. Def preserved 15 days on prearraignment rights. Next hearing to be set after decision on substitution made. Bond cont. 11:43 pm adj.

10:30 AM. JL-Clerk. Defendant Jacques G Simon II not in court.  Attorney Derek W Sanders in court for Jacques G Simon II.  Attorney David Stilin in court for State of Wisconsin. State req warrant, geo to WI/MN. CT does not authorize warrant, reschedules hearing. CT denies motion to dismiss that was taken under advisement at last hearing. Bond cont. 10:35 am adj
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 11, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on October 11, 2022 at 11:30 am.

11:32 AM. JL-Clerk. Defendant Jacques G Simon II in court.  Attorney David Stilin in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Derek W Sanders in court for Jacques G Simon II. State requests continuance. Atty Sanders moves to dismiss. CT takes motion to dismiss under advisement. Bond cont. 11:39 am adj.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on August 31, 2022 at 10:30 am.

records.addlTxt: No controlled substances without a prescription. Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion.

Prosecuting attorney Jeffrey Lawrence Kemp in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Jacques G Simon II appeared by video, in custody. Attorney Derek Sanders appears by video means. 1:28 p.m. AO-Clerk. De qualifies, has rec'd CC, waive reading. State requests sig bond. Ct sets bond. WSPH. 1:32 p.m. adj.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 11:30 am.
